p: Chlorotic symptoms could be detected by visual examination of plants at D6. Precise visual analysis of plants also enabled the detection of dry tips of leaves that appeared on PD and KD plants at D11 ( Supplementary Figure S4). However, RS demonstrated an average of 84.6% accuracy in predicting ND, PD, KD nutrient deficiency earlier, at D2. This accuracy increased to 93.9% at D4 and remained above 90% thereafter.
